entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who intends to work against Voldemort. He is described as a person with authority and wisdom.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the main antagonist that Dumbledore intends to work against. He is described as a dark lord.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as someone who is on the same side as Dumbledore if he is against Voldemort. He is described as a person who seems uncertain and unsure of himself.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who shows the Dark Mark to Fudge. He is described as a person with a harsh tone.

entities.name: the dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is mentioned as a symbol of Voldemort's power and presence. It is described as something that can be seen on people who are connected to Voldemort.

relationships.description: Dumbledore intends to work against Voldemort, indicating a relationship of opposition between the two.
Fudge is on the same side as Dumbledore if he is against Voldemort, indicating a relationship of alliance between Fudge and Dumbledore.
Snape shows the Dark Mark to Fudge, indicating that Snape is a witness or a source of information for Fudge about Voldemort's presence.
